name: Rags
description: A set of threadbare garments, such as befits a beggar.

name: Formal Wear
description: Appropriate for appearances before a noble or royal court.

name: Religious Vestments
description: Distinguishing attire of a priest, cleric, or similar ilk.

name: Sorcerer's Robes
description: Distinguishes one as a practitioner of the arcane. Grants advantage on ability checks to cast magical spells.

name: Druid's Robes
description: Rugged robes that never wear thin or lose color. Signifies membership in a druidic circle, and grants advantage on medicine and nature ability checks.

name: Bathrobe
description: Comfortable and lightweight. A rich man's vanity.

name: Hooded Cloak
description: Offers protection from rain and cold, as well as a distinct air of mystery.

name: Alchemical Apron
description: A cloth apron treated to weather the onslaught of acid. Increases BC versus acid damage by 3. If worn over armor, it falls off after 10+1d10 slashing damage is received.

name: Blacksmith's Apron
description: A thick leather apron designed to withstand wayward sprays of sparks. Increases BC versus fire damage by 3. If worn over armor, it falls off after 10+1d10 slashing damage is received.

name: Gloves
description: Prevents callouses and protects one's hands from the cold.

name: Hiking Boots
description: Comfortable, so as to accommodate long journeys.

name: Climbing Boots
description: Includes crampons for the surest of footing. +2 to mobility checks.
